explanation: [0-0] In a sun-drenched garden, a little girl in a green floral dress stands barefoot on the grass, holding a teddy bear in her left hand. With her right hand, she takes a red popsicle from a pink mold filled with several other popsicles. A pair of hands wearing gold bracelets holds the pink mold. Behind the girl are pink flowers and green plants.
[0-5] The shot cuts to the little girl holding the popsicle, her face beaming with joy. The popsicle is shaped like a cute owl. The white caption "Erdbeereis! Eule.." appears on the screen.
